DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Tachinid abundance and species richness in organic and conventional farms
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: The file contains all data used in the statistical analyses described in the materials and methods section of the article. The dataset includes: “Region” (“S” = Central South West and “N” = North Midlands), “Cluster” (the cluster of paired landscapes), “Landscape” (“hotspot” = landscapes with high proportion of land under organic farming and “coldspot” = landscapes with low proportion of land under organic farming), “Management” (“Organic” and “Conventional” farm management), “Habitat” (“arable” = mainly winter wheat fields and “grassland” = mainly grazed permanent pastures), “Field” (three replicates A-C), “Location” (“margin” and “centre” trap position within each field), “Abundance” and “Species Richness” (total per each site).
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Agricultural intensification
Agri-environment schemes
Biocontrol
Natural enemies
Scale-dependence
Management
